dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5764 IH: AI for Mainstreet Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Alford (for himself and Ms. Scholten) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to require small business development centers to assist small business concerns with the use of artificial intelligence, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the AI for Mainstreet Act.

section.header: Guidance on the use of artificial intelligence for small business concerns

subsection.text: Section 21(c)(3) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 648(c)(3)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (T), by striking and at the end;
in the first subparagraph (U) (relating to encouraging and assisting the provision of succession planning), by striking the period at the end and inserting a semicolon;
by redesignating the second subparagraph (U) (relating to providing training in conjunction with the United States Patent and Trademark Office) as subparagraph (V);
in subparagraph (V), as so redesignated, by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: assisting small business concerns in evaluating artificial intelligence concerning operations, including by—

clause.text: providing information, guidance, and training to small business concerns on the use of artificial intelligence, including—

subclause.text: best practices for using artificial intelligence;
using artificial intelligence to plan for unexpected circumstances, protect data and intellectual property, improve cybersecurity, facilitate regulatory compliance, and improve customer trust; and
incorporating artificial intelligence into business operations; and

clause.text: conducting outreach to the extent practical to small business concerns regarding the use of artificial intelligence.

subsection.text: Section 3 of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 632) is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:
In this Act, the term artificial intelligence has the meaning given such term in section 5002 of the National Artificial Intelligence Initiative Act of 2020 (15 U.S.C. 9401).

section.text: No additional amounts are authorized to carry out this Act or the amendments made by this Act.
